long: Meaning: to "draw", used in a great variety of applications (including to "sow", to "sound", to "prolong", to "develop", to "march", to "remove", to "delay", to "be tall", etc.).  Usage: draw (along, out), continue, defer, extend, forbear, × give, handle, make (pro-, sound) long, × sow, scatter, stretch out.  Source: a primitive root;
